txt.en:
Ost Elendil, beyond the bridge of Ariant, was once the high seat of the kings of Annúminas. No longer -- after lying abandoned for a terribly long count of years, it is now held by the evil that came out of Angmar.

Of Amarthiel's lieutenants, the Black Númenórean named Balhest is surely the most cruel. He it is that sits in Ost Elendil and holds it against us behind an army of fell spirits and Angmarim sworn to him.

Balhest must be defeated if we are to retake the city, [placeholder]. If it can be done, it must be. The Dúnedain cannot fight this foe alone. If I am not here when you return, bring this news to Captain-General Daerdan at Echad Garthadir, for he will be most pleased at your success!

'Ost Elendil, beyond the bridge of Ariant, was once the high seat of the kings of Annúminas. No longer -- after lying abandoned for a terribly long count of years, it is now held by the evil that came out of Angmar.

'Of Amarthiel's lieutenants, the Black Númenórean named Balhest is surely the most cruel. He it is that sits in Ost Elendil and holds it against us behind an army of fell spirits and Angmarim sworn to him.

'Balhest must be defeated if we are to retake the city, [placeholder]. If it can be done, it must be. The Dúnedain cannot fight this foe alone. If I am not here when you return, bring this news to Captain-General Daerdan at Echad Garthadir, for he will be most pleased at your success!'
Balhest, one of Amarthiel's mightiest Black Númenórean lieutenants, is in Ost Elendil.\n\nLegrindavor has asked you to put an end to Balhest so that Ost Elendil might be reclaimed.
'You have put an end to Balhest? I can hardly believe it, but I know you speak the truth! Legrindavor will be as surprised as I am, but as pleased!\n\n'Please take this reward for your victory!'

Legrindavor is likely at Tirband, the court beneath the great watch-tower on the highest level of the city. If he is not, he asked you to report to Captain-General Daerdan at the Ranger-encampment of Echad Garthadir in the heart of Annúminas.\n\nYou have defeated Balhest and should now return with news of your victory to Legrindavor.
'The defeat of Balhest is more than we could have expected, [placeholder]. Very well done!'

'You have defeated Balhest, [placeholder]? You have succeeded where many have failed! Surely Ost Elendil will not be in the hands of the Enemy for much longer, if we continue to have victories such as this!'
'Amarthiel's Black Númenóreans are her greatest servants.'
'Amarthiel's Black Númenóreans are her greatest servants.'
Talk to Captain-general Daerdan at Echad Garthadir
